is_roi_overlap_segment.description: Refine segmentation by overlaying ROI class.

overlap_roi_score_threshold.description: Minimum probability of detected ROI to consider for replacing segmentation.

is_publish_color_mask.description: Publish color mask for result visualization.

roi_overlay_segment_label.description: Enable/disable ROI overlay for specific labels.

score_threshold.description: Threshold for object existence probability. Objects with scores below this value are ignored.

precision.description: Operation precision for inference. Options: fp32, fp16, int8.

calibration_algorithm.description: Algorithm for quantization calibration when precision is int8. Options: Entropy, (Legacy | Percentile), MinMax.

dla_core_id.description: DLA core ID for inference. If positive, assigns inference task to the specified DLA core.

quantize_first_layer.description: Enable fp16 precision for the first (input) layer when precision is int8.

quantize_last_layer.description: Enable fp16 precision for the last (output) layer when precision is int8.

profile_per_layer.description: Enable profiler for each layer. Recommended only for development.

clip_value.description: Maximum clipping value for layer output. Valid only for int8 precision.

gpu_id.description: GPU ID for selecting CUDA device.

calibration_image_list_path.description: Path to file containing image paths for int8 quantization calibration.
